title: Himi 221
lyrics:
M.N.N.
1.
Ha’u ‘akimoutolu,
‘Oku loto tui,
Ki he huafa ‘o Sīsū,
Pea ‘Eiki ‘aki.
2.
Pea ke tau tauhi,
Hono ‘Ohomohe,
‘O fai ‘ene fekau lelei,
Na’e fokotu’u.
3.
Ko e ‘ohomohe,
‘A ‘ene ‘Afio;
Mou ha’u ke tau tauhi ia,
Hangē ko e fekau.
4.
Na’e pehē ia,
Mou fa’a fai ‘eni
’I he fakamanatu’i
Ki he’eku mate.
5. Ke tau fakahā ai
‘A ‘etau tui ni,
Ki he pekia ‘a Sīsū
‘I he’etau hia.
6. Ko e ngāue ni
‘Oku tau hoko ai,
‘O fakamo’oni ‘aki,
’A ‘etau ma’u ia.
7
Pea tau hokosi,
‘A ‘ene ‘Afio;
‘O ne ma’u ‘a kitautolu,
Ke tau tauhi ia.
8. Ko e ‘ofeina,
Kuo ne fakatau
‘Aki hono ta’ata’a
Ko e hifo ia.
9.
Ko e fu’u totongi
Ki hotau ‘Otua,
‘I he hia ‘a māmani,
Pea mahu’inga.
10.
Pea tau lava’i,
‘A hotu ‘Otua,
Mo e fakamolemole,
‘I he’etau hia. *
